item.title: Russia and Ukraine Hold U.S.-Mediated Talks in Riyadh: What to Know
item.description: American envoys began talks with Russian officials on Monday, a day after meeting with a Ukrainian delegation. The discussions were expected to focus ...

item.title: Mark Carney Calls Snap Elections in Canada Amid Trump Threats
item.description: Mark Carney, who has only been prime minister for 10 days, has called for a general election to be held on April 28.

item.title: Trump Did What Castros Couldn’t: Take Radio Martí Off the Air
item.description: For four decades, a U.S.-financed broadcaster provoked the ire of the communist government in Cuba. President Trump dismantled it in a matter of days.

item.title: To Him, Americans Were Always Heroes. He’s Not So Sure About Today’s.
item.description: A tour led by an 88-year-old guide in Bastogne, Belgium, scene of a critical battle of World War II, offers a snapshot into the way President Trump’s ...

item.title: Lebanon, Ravaged by Israel-Hezbollah War, Needs Changes to Unlock Aid
item.description: For years, the country has failed to enact financial and governance overhauls required by lenders. The recent fighting has made that problem urgent.
